Case study of fuzzy system11.Application

name.en: Disaster Prevention Management of High Rise Buildings

description.zh: 1.高層建物之實態與傾向2.高層建物之火災災例分析3.高層建物火災時避難安全問題4.避難安全設計5.高層建物之火災安全對策6.實例研討
description.en: 1.Situation & Development of High-rise Buildings2.Analysis for High-rise Building in Fire3.Evacuation Safety on High-rise Building Fires4.Designing for Evacuation Safety5.Strategies of Fire Protection for High-rise Buildings6.Case Study

description.zh: 介紹當代應用於設計研究和發展自設計研究的各種重要理論，當作博碩士生研究與創作的準備。內容包括將設計視為目標導向、賦予價值的一般性問題解決活動，以及將設計視為檢驗溝通傳達過程與模式的調查研究，幫助研究生綜覽各種知識傳統下的設計理論，有效掌握並發展特定研究主題的適當理論與方法。
description.en: Introduction of contemporary theories applied to and developed in design research, in which design is considered as a mode of inquiry, including examination of communication process and models, and emphasizing general problem-solving as a goal-directed, value-laden activity.

name.zh: 電腦整合設計與製造研究
name.en: Study of Computer Integrated Design and Manufacturing

description.zh: 本課程旨在介紹研究電腦整合設計與製造之軟體，並藉實例演練，以達熟悉研究電腦整合設計與製造之操作與功能。
description.en: To introduce and study the software of computer integrated design and manufacturing.  By the project practice, to be adept at the operation and function of computer integrated design and manufacturing.

name.zh: 設計研析與創作實務專題(一)
name.en: Topics on Design Research and Design Practice(I)

description.zh: 透過專題討論方式，使學生對設計研究及創作實務相關議題及趨勢有更深入的瞭解。專題內容主要包括1.文化生活設計、2.設計美學、3. 消費文化與設計策略、4.設計行為與創造力、5.以及其他學生有興趣研究的設計研析與實務創作主題。
description.en: To make students have a better understanding on various topics regarding the issues and trends of design research and design practice. Topics are mainly as follows: 1. Cultural Life Design, 2. Design Aesthetics, 3.Consumption Culture and Design Strategy, 4. Design Behavior and Creativity, 5. Other topics that students are interested in their related researches.

description.zh: 以親人性、創造力跨科際整合的設計思維，對設計知識與專業技能之理論及實務，從文獻探討、理論專研、實務案例等深入淺出，培養設計專業領域相關知能、洞見和體認，期能對設計相關問題解決，提出整合、創新、前瞻之具體可行方案。
description.en: In an age of rapid social, technological and cultural change, we need a new kind of design professional who is able to bring the creativity, innovation, flexibility and knowledge needed to exploit new opportunities and make things happen. Through literature review, theoretical study, and case study, this course provides design related competence and new insights, in terms of tacit knowledge, ideation, humane, and interdisciplinary thinking.

description.zh: 本課程係透過跨領域整合之創新思維，針對設計領域之專業理論與實務，進行相關文獻探討、個案研究及專題實務案例等深入研析，培養研究者之設計專業觀察與洞察能力，並能提出設計相關問題之解決方案，與具創新與前瞻性之具體可行方案，並實際應用於設計專案之實務操作，以期培育學生從創新思維到實務設計能力，進行設計教育之翻轉。
description.en: This course aims at the professional theory and practice in the field of design through the innovative thinking of interdisciplinary integration. It conducts in-depth research on relevant literatures and case studies. It can cultivate the professional ability of observation and insight of design professionals. Design-related solutions, and innovative and forward-looking concrete and feasible programs, and practical application of the practical operation of the design project, in order to cultivate students from innovative thinking to practical design capabilities, design education flip.

description.zh: 本課程透過專題討論方式，針對學生之設計研究主題進行研討，透過實務相關議題之深入解析，培養學生之研究方法及論述的能力，建立自己的研究架構，經由(一)至(四)個階段之訓練，使研究議題能由淺入深，完成其各階段性之設計研究專題。
description.en: This course is focus on the discussion of students’ deign topics in seminar form. Through the in-depth analysis of practices related issues to train students’ research methods and discuss ability; and construct their own research frameworks. Furthermore, students could complete each design projects of different stages through four stages training.

description.zh: 課程以人因研究為基礎，分為四個階段：文獻資料收集與分析、人因實驗、創新設計、使用者受測評估實驗。透過系統化人因研究與應用設計之步驟與流程，帶領學生了解人因研究之實驗方法，啟發人本設計概念。
description.en: The course is based on ergonomic. There are four stages: literature review, ergonomic experiment, creative design and evaluation. Students will learn the scientific research method in ergonomic through step by step process.

name.zh: 設計研究與創作專題(二)
name.en: The Research and Practice on Design Issues (II)

description.zh: 針對特定設計議題，學生學習應用研究與設計理論，並透過適當研究與設計方法探討其潛在的問題與有效的解決方法。議題主要針對：產品、空間、資訊、機構識別等設計行銷與服務設計、評量與管理等項目之研究與創作。課程研習結果可望作為研究生進階研究或設計創作之重要基礎。
description.en: Focusing on specific design issues, the subject directs students to apply proper theories and methods in research and design in order to explore critical problems and to provide effective solutions. Specific issues in relation to marketing and service management regarding the design of product, space, information and corporate identity are to be researched and be practiced. The result of study forms the foundation of further research or design development for research students.

description.zh: 本課程是為非電影系的大專學生所設計的，希望在一個學期的課程中，能使學生對電影藝術有概括的了解。課程包括電影原理與形式美學、電影史、以及電影理論；以影片(某段時期的作品)與形式分析交互進行。上課方式為：講課、影片觀賞與討論，所觀賞的影片兼及經典與當代作品，例如：卓別林、希區考克、史匹柏、珍康萍等導演的作品。本課程的重點在原理的說明和理論的探討，使學生能以新的角度解讀電影，具有深度評析電影的能力。
description.en: This course is designed to give non-film major college students a comprehensive understanding of film within one semester.  The goal of the course is to provide a survey of some major topics in cinema studies which are organized into three sections: film production and techniques, history, and criticism and theory.  Course activities include lectures, film/video screenings, and discussions.  Not only classic but also contemporary works will be screened, such as the films of Charles Chaplin, Serger Eisesnsten, Alfred Hitchcock, Steven Spielberg, Jane Campion and David Cronenberg. Although the course will focus primarily on theory, discussion are welcome.

description.zh: 科技發展為促進人類社會進步的主要動力。現今，科技發展中的性別議題與性別政治也漸漸受到國際社會的重視。本課程首先讓學生意識到在科學教育中性別失衡的現象與其成因。之後從社會學、人類學與性別學切入當前性別科技發展中的各項議題。最後將會以全球視角與永續發展指標(SDGs)來檢視科技發展中的性別政治，給予學生更宏觀和深入的分析，培養未來具人文關懷的科技專業人才。本課程將全程以英文授課。
description.en: Science and technology development is the main driving force to promote the progress of human society. Nowadays, gender issues and gender politics in the development of science and technology have been paid more and more attention by the international community. In this class, firstly, students will be aware of the phenomenon of gender imbalance in science education and its causes. Secondly, I am going to talk about current development of gendered technology from perspectives of sociology, anthropology and gender. Finally, I will lead students to examine gender politics in science and technology from a global perspective and sustainable development indicators (SDGs). This class aims to give students a more macro- and in-depth analysis and cultivating future talented humanities and technology professionals. This course will be taught in English throughout the course.

name.zh: 新能源車輛技術發展與實務工程
name.en: Technology Development and its Industry Engineering Practice

description.zh: 本課程在於讓學生對於新能源車輛產業及其工程實務有廣泛的了解，產業面包括產業現況、法規、政策、動力系統技術，工程實務則涵括動力、傳動、能源、控制等系統之開發及維護，及車輛業界產品開發中心及維修廠之企業參訪。課程中之動力系統將包括半複合動力、全複合動力、純電動車及氫燃料電池系統，能源系統將討論鉛酸電池、鎳鐵電池、鋰電池，及其充放電機制及管理系統。
description.en: 1.To educate student to have a general comprehensive knowledge on green vehicle industry status, regulation, policy, powertrain technology and its Industry Engineering Practice including the development and maintenance processes of the powertrain, transmission, energy, control systems, and the industry practice at the product development center or the service station of the car company. 2.The powertrain system will include the mild-hybrid, full hybrid, pure motor drive, and fuel cell systems. The energy system will include the introduction of the lead acid, nickel-metal hydride, and lithium-ion batteries, and their charging-discharging mechanism and its management devices.3.This class will lead the students to be able to learn the process of the green vehicle development and also to have an opportunity to receive the lectures from the car maker experts on the car maker product development center or the service station.

description.zh: 由最原始的原點即動物的觀點，觀看並理解「人類」所營造出的空間領域，並討論其意義及重要性。
description.en: The course focuses on observation and understanding the territory created by human in terms of the viewpoint of animals, which could be the most original one, and discuss the importance and the meaning.

notes: 設計603，日職合開,中日雙語授課

description.zh: 本課程目的在於讓學生瞭解通路策略之基本理論與整體架構，明瞭行銷通路的關係，知道並熟悉行銷通路策略的分析與研究方法，討論行銷通路策略的發展趨勢。而授課主題包括通路的本質、功能與流程、通路行為與通路策略等。
description.en: The Objective of this course is to discuss major topics in Channels Strategy. A marketing channel is viewed as an interorganizational system involved with the task of making goods, services, and concepts available for consumption by enhancing their time, place, and possession utilities. It is to introduce student concepts and skills to master major issues in the class. Through case discussion, students will develop skills in making Channel Strategic decisions. Course requirements are attendance, participation, presentations. The topics have function and flow of channel, channel behavior, and channel strategy.

description.zh: 由於網際網路的快速發展，帶來了一個新的商務模式的發展。本課程希望能給同學們對企業創新課題的廣泛性了解，也深入的介紹一些基本的觀念和原理原則。另外，企業創新，許多都和新科技的新應用有關，而當中許多的可能性都還在發展階段，本門課主要是在探討創新的一些基本觀念，以及國內外企業創新的案例。
description.en: Since the Internet EB fast development, the new business model should be developed. This course will offer some topics related to business innovation and management issues. The fundamental concept and theoretic principle will also introduce.   Besides, the concept and applications of business and service model, business process reengineering, and the case study will also include.

description.zh: 本課程藉由理論說明與實例探討，讓同學能夠了解理財規劃的運作及財富管理現況，並引導同學應用所學專業來分析財經時事，以提升個人理財規劃效能，養成對趨勢、產業發展及投資判斷的智慧，本課程並安排實務業之專業人士，針對相關課程主題做深入介紹及實務經驗分享。
description.en: This course aims to provide a solid foundation which is essential for creating and managing an investment portfolio for individual clients. It focuses on the practical application of portfolio management and asset allocation processes in the context of wealth management for individual investors. With an introduction to the fundamental principles and the financial planning process, this course emphasizes on the provision of investment advisory services. It discusses client expectations and concerns including risk and other cognitive issues before applying the concepts and techniques to construct and manage investment portfolios for the client.In addition, this course incorporates other wealth management issues including consumption planning, asset acquisition and retirement planning in designing a financial plan.

description.zh: 1.簡介：概觀、資訊源、通道、通訊品質、數位通訊系統2.信號與系統：傅立葉轉換、線性系統3.類比數位變換：取樣、量化、脈碼調變4.機率與隨機程序5.基頻脈波傳送：相配濾波器、信號間干擾與脈波塑型、等化6.數位通頻傳輸：ASK,PSK,QPSK,DPSK,FSK,QAM,MSK7.多工與展頻技術：分頻多工、分時多工、直序列與跳頻分碼多工8.源編碼：熵、資料緊縮、霍夫曼編碼、資料壓縮、JPEG9.通道編碼：線性區塊碼、迴旋碼
description.en: 1.introduction :overview,information sources,channels,quality measurement,a closer look of modern digital communication systems2.Signals and Systems:Fourier transform,linear systems3.A/D Conversion :sampling ,quantization ,PCM4.Probability and Random Process5.Baseband Pulse Transmission :matched filters,ISI and shaping ,qeualization6.Digital Passband Transmisson:ASK,PSK,QPSK,DPSK,FSK,QAM,MAK7.Multiplexing and Spread Sprctrum   Techniques:FDMA,TDMA,direct sequence and frequency hopping   CDMA8.Source Coding:entropy ,data compaction,Huffman coding,data   compression,JPEG9.Channel Coding :linear block codes,convolutional codes

notes: 職四子三 職二子三 合開

description.zh: 本課程將介紹一系列的生物分子及這些生物分子所扮演的角色。課程從認識細菌、植物、動物細胞及各種細胞胞器開始，接著探討蛋白質、酵素、DNA、RNA結構和功能及他們在生命中的重要性。再論及DNA複製及轉錄和RNA轉譯成蛋白質的重要性及機制。PCR和DNA重組技術的重要性是安排在最後來介紹。
description.en: This course is to introduce a series of biomaterials and their functions. Begins from bacterial, plant, and animal cells and the differences between these cell organs. To learn of DNA, RNA, proteins, and enzymes base on their structures and functions. The phenomena of DNA replication and translation, and RNA translation will be studied. The PCR method and DNA recombinant technology also included in this course.

description.zh: 先修課程:4402012或負責教授同意介紹各種不同方法分析（如能量法及 Castigliano 定理），破壞理論，材料選用，可靠度概念，軸及軸承，離合器及煞車器，傳動元件（如皮帶、鏈條、齒輪），軸聯接器，飛輪，彈簧等。
description.en: Introduction to Analysis Methods (Energy method & Castigliano theorem), Failure Theory, Material Selection, Introduction to Reliability, Shafts and Bearings, Clutches and Brakes, Power Transmission Elements (Belts, Chains, Gears), Couplings, Flywheels, Springs.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。感測器與驅動器簡介，資料傳輸方法，物理式感測器與驅動器：聲動式，磁式性，壓電式，電力式，電磁式，熱電式，熱阻式，光導式，光發射式，光電式。化學式感測器與驅動器：化學與氣體感測器,生醫感測器與生物晶片
description.en: Introduction to sensors and actuators, data transmission methods, physics based sensors and actuators：sonic, magnetic, piezoelectric, electrical, electromagnetic, thermoelectric, thermoresistive, photoconductive, photoemissive, photovoltaic; chemistry based sensors and actuators：chemical and gas sensors, bio-medical sensors and biochips.

description.zh: 本課程為提昇同學對於法律落實於生活相關議題之興趣，藉由講授基礎法律概念，並輔以日常生活之案例事實解說，使同學得以了解法律如何運用於生活之中。學期中同學須依其學習所得，提出生活中相關法律問題之書面心得報告，檢視其學習成果並於課堂充分討論。介紹與日常生活相關之法律知識，運用案例事實解說。主要內容為：民事法律案例(含買賣消費、房屋租賃等)、身分法律案例、職場勞動法律案例、刑事法律案例、行政機關與人民間之法律關係，及其他常見法律案例。
description.en: Description legal knowledge and citing examples related to daily life. Main contents are : Introduction of Civil law and life, labor issues and examples of Labor Standards Act, Criminal legal issues and life examples, government-citizen relations with the people, and other relevant legal and examples of life.

description.zh: 產品研發創新管理課程主要對象為有興趣從事企業產品研發創新發明機會或技能的學生們。此課程不僅介紹基礎發明工具而且提供課程上實際演練。主要內容包含如何辨識企業產品研發創新機會與問題；發現新點子；發展最適解答；展示創新成果與萃思方法介紹。課程上也會提出許多相關企業的應用實例討論。    其目的在於幫助學生們學習了解創新工具與系統創新方法在產品研發創新管理的專業領域及利用課程上的產品研發創新工具或取更好的工作機會
description.en: Production R&D Innovation Management course focuses on the particular interest to those students who are considering Production R&D development of an innovative business opportunity or innovation management skills. This course not only discusses the basics toolkits for every innovator needs, but also provides the practice workshop of systematic innovation. Major topics include how to identifying the opportunity and problem of Production R&D; discover the new ideas; develop the solution; demonstrate the innovation; and the TRIZ works. Many of the examples will also be discussed in their entrepreneurial approaches to Production R&D innovation.    Objective: To develop an understanding of innovation toolkits and systematic innovation approach to help students making better understanding in Production R&D innovation management and equipping with the innovation skills needed to pursue a viable career option.

description.zh: 本課程只在針對互聯網發展下如何釐清其中關鍵議題如什麼是互聯網、互聯網核心思維、互聯網與物聯網之區別、互聯網影響哪些行業、傳統性企業如何在物聯網時代轉型、及其未來之發展。之後其中之理論及各產業之應用案例之研討亦包含其中。
description.en: This course will focus on the development of the Internet for how to clarify the key issues such as what is the Internet, the Internet core thinking, the difference between the Internet+ and the Internet of Things, the impact of the Internet on which industry, how traditional enterprises in the era of things transition, and its future development. After which the theory and the application of the case study of the industry also includes them.

description.zh: 本課程將邀請產、官、學界知名人士，以演講或座談的方式，與EMBA學生交流溝通及討論。利用這些知名人士的實務經驗與學養，來啟發EMBA學生的創意與想法。
description.en: This course will invite the renowned individuals in business, government, and universities to exchange the ideas and opinions with the EMBA students through invited speech or seminar. The idea is to utilize the practical experience and knowledge possessed by these individuals to inspire the innovation and thinking of EMBA students.

notes: B2國際會議停廳限碩二工、經、資合開

name.en: The Practice and Application of Building Information Modeling (BIM)

description.zh: 本課程將介紹學生使用BIM進行建築設計、各單位的互相溝通和施工階段的圖面整合。本課程並介紹使用Revit Architecture軟體的基本概念和操作方式。通過軟體使用將引導學生以標準施工設計界面，創造參數係列和準備施工文件。
description.en: This course will introduce students to using BIM for architectural design exploration, communication, and construction. The class will introduce essential software concepts and hands-on operations with Revit Architecture. Hands-on exercises will lead students through the software interface, standard construction systems, creating parametric families and preparing construction documents.

name.en: Theory and Practice of Landscape Ecological Planning

description.zh: 景觀生態學是以生態學理論來理解並建立一套可以認知景觀與其中的生物﹑非生物環境關係的學科。有關景觀的生態規劃理論基本上是將這一系列景觀生態學模型或原理作為設計指標而形成的一套規劃操作理論。景觀生態原理在景觀學科中具有極其根本的角色，不僅在景觀資源保育與管理上提供極具價值的參考；對於景觀規畫與設計實務者更提供了在不同尺度範疇狀況下三向度空間設計的形態準則。因此，課程涵蓋了從區域、基地和細部設計三種尺度的設計內涵，講述及操作在基於不同目的的需求時，人為景觀如何介入自然環境，以及導入的人為景觀的設計準則。 1. 景觀生態與形態理論 2. 景觀生態設計理論 3. 景觀生態規劃理論的應用 a. 都市地區和鄉村地區 b. 區域、基地和細部設計尺度
description.en: Landscape ecology seeks for principles and models that contribute to dealing with conservation, management, and planning in landscape practice. The course "Landscape Theory and Practice of Ecological Planning" refers to those principles and models established in landscape ecology and then applies to landscape planning and design. Issues relates to this courses are listed as follows; 1. Landscape Ecology and landscape morphology 2. Ecological planning theory 3. The application of ecological theory in landscape practice a. Urban region and countryside b. Macro-sale, meso-sale, and micro-scale

notes: 碩士碩與碩專合併開課

description.zh: 本課程的主要目的在教授學生區塊鏈與機器人理財的基本概念，使學生能夠創造區塊鏈與機器人理財方面的創新應用。課程內容包括：區塊鏈概論、區塊鏈基本原理、區塊鏈應用、機器學習概論、分類與迴歸、大數據、財富管理、演算法、與機器人理財應用等。
description.en: This course is to instruct students the basic concepts of blockchain and robotic advisory and to enable students to develop innovative applications of blockchain and robotic advisory. The contents include introduction to blockchain, blockchain principle, blockchain applications, machine learning basics, classification and regression, big data, wealth management, algorithms and robot advisory applications.

name.en: Financial Technology and Corporate Financial Management

description.zh: 本課程的主要目的在教授學生金融科技與公司理財的基本概念與應用，以及創新思考的方法，使學生能夠創造金融科技與公司理財方面的創新應用。課程內容包括：金融科技概論、金融科技商業模式、金融科技專利、金融科技策略、資本市場、投資、股價、債務與股利。
description.en: This course is to instruct students the basic concepts of financial technology and corporate financial management. The goal is to enable students to develop innovative applications of financial technology and corporate financial management. The contents include introduction to financial technology, business models of financial technology, financial technology patents, financial technology strategies, money and capital market, investments, stock price, use of debt and dividend policy.

name.en: Introduction to Thin Film Science and Engineering

description.zh: 薄膜材料科學，真空科學與技術，薄膜蒸鍍製程，放電、電漿、離子與表面作用，物理氣相沈積，化學氣相沈積，基材表面與薄膜成核，薄膜結構，薄膜性質測試，薄膜之相互擴散、反應與轉換，薄膜之機械性質。
description.en: 1. Thin film materials science2. Vacuum science and technology 3. Thin film evaporation processes4. Discharge, plasma, and ion-surface interaction5. Plasma and ion beam processing of thin films6. Chemical vapor deposition7. Substrate surfaces and thin film nucleation8. Film structure9. Characterization of thin films and surface10. Interdiffusion, reactions, and transformations in thin films11. Mechanical properties of thin films

description.zh: 1. 智慧型控制系統簡介 2. 類神經網路（ANN）系統2-1 類神經網路基礎 2-2 類神經網路應用及實習 3. 模糊邏輯控制系統 3-1 模糊邏輯基礎 3-2 模糊控制應用及實習 4. 基因演算法 4-1 基因演算法基礎 4-2 基因演算法在控制器調制之應用及實習
description.en: English Description: 1. Introduction of artificial intelligence control system 2. Artificial neural networks (ANN) 2-1 ANN fundamentals 2-2 Applications and experiments of neural-control 3. Fuzzy logic control system  3-1 Fuzzy logic basics 3-2 Applications and experiments of fuzzy control 4. Genetic algorithms 4-1 Preliminary of GA  4-2 Tuning of Controllers using genetic algorithms.

name.zh: 整合經營策略個案分析
name.en: Integrated Business and Strategy Management Case Studies

description.zh: 本課程以哈佛個案教學方法進行，主要以策略管理與營運模式為核心，在每個個案討論當中，同時由策略管理、人力資源管理、組織管理、服務管理領域老師教授。可以讓學生從策略的角度，學習這些管理功能的整合與營運模式，學期末並有分組個案競賽，促進團隊互動與學習。
description.en: The Integrated Strategy Management Case Studies would be taught by case methods from Havard Business School’s cases. Every case will be taught from Strategy, HRM, Organization Management, and service Management areas faculty. This course focus on the integration of management functions. The case contest will be hold on the final week to encourage team building and learning.

name.en: Technologies and Applications of Car Network

description.zh: 本課程內容著重於車輛網路技術之介紹、整合應用與未來發展，如現在車輛各嵌入式控制之機電整合次系統間的控制資訊，車輛與車輛間的駕駛與運動資訊傳遞，車輛與公共交通管理基礎系統訊息溝通，及車輛與雲端之連結與訊息傳遞，最後這方面的應用可說無遠弗屆，諸如生活資訊交流(物聯網)、車輛健康與維修等資訊之交換及統計分析(大數據)、駕駛健康與緊急事件之處理(智能照顧體系)、智能型導航，及因應正在發展中的移動式分享經濟模式發展所需之資訊交換。
description.en: This course will focus on the importance role of integrated application of information communication, which may interchange in between the car as a lot of subsystems made by embedded microcontrollers, occur in between a vehicle to another's(V2V, Vehicle to vehicle information for driving), vehicle to the public traffic infrastructure(the traffic management system of mega-city of highway) or vehicle to Cloud(all kinds of services can be integrated into, for example, living information, car repairing interactive information, driver health monitor, emergency event, smart navigation or many kinds of emerging and sharing  manipulation system for future travelling and motion.

description.zh: 以管理經理的角色，經營組織運作系統，包括代理權與機構間的結合，課程包含1.以策略態勢，瞭解和定義零售和批發商概念。2.學習通路管理和行銷組合。3.學習通路規劃、統合和組織。4.學習通路評估與管理。
description.en: This course includes:1. Important concepts in retailing and wholesaling are defined and explained from a strategic perspective; 2.Study channel management and the marketing mix; 3.Study channel planning, coordination and organization; 4. Study channel assessment and control.

description.zh: 探討如何規畫、組織、用人、領導及控制各種資源包括人員、設備、材料、資金，期能及時在容許預算下完成特定專案。
description.en: This course discovers the planning, organization, employment, leading and control of resources including person, facility, materials, and capital in order to complete the project under the pre-specified time and cost.

description.zh: 應用試作技術課程之試作技術，進行家具相關設計圖面實體模型之材料加工、組裝實作。
description.en: To practice product model making techniques. Based on furniture product working drawing, design students can practice model making techniques with different materials and processing methods.

name.zh: 服務設計與管理創業專題
name.en: Business Startup on Service Design and Management

description.zh: 從設計的立足點，探討服務管理的理論與實務應用，並以完成新創事業之服務藍圖與模型為研習目標。
description.en: From field of design, the study stresses the research and application of Service Management theories, and aims at the completion of service blueprints and service models for a startup business.

description.zh: 色彩心理的探究與活用及色彩意象調查以利傳播產品的意象與意義及意境。藉由色彩使用法之實習使色彩機能有效地活用於商業、工業及生活面上。
description.en: Practice of systematical color planning techniques, with emphasis on color image survey and its application for the practical use in design.

description.zh: 練習設計構想草圖速繪法；從基本幾何形體至複雜產品、空間循序漸進；常用材質（木質、金屬、透明材質、石材及皮革等）之表現技法；產品精描、透視圖法、三視圖、爆炸圖、組立圖等之精描，說明圖板及各種畫材（麥克筆、粉彩、色鉛筆及水彩）等之應用。
description.en: This course put emphasis on offering students having enough skills on :1.Abilities to sketch their idea visible to the others.2.Coloring design sketches to let the drawings have better comprehensibility.3.Good skill for Renderings. Medias for this course shall include markers, pastels water colors and color pencils.

description.zh: 本課程提供學生與實務界交流的平台，邀請不同領域的專家進行專題演講，並提供相互研討交流的機會，藉此使同學瞭解業界現況及未來學習的發展方向。
description.en: This course provides students a platform for interacting with current industry, through giving speeches from different field of industry experts. And provide opportunities for mutual discussions and exchanges. Thereby enabling students to understand the development of the industry's current status and future direction of learning.

description.zh: 解說大型相機多重焦距調整和影像形狀的修正及變形功能,如何配合造型設計及啟發造形創意,使學生熟悉大型相機操作方式及攝影技巧,由忠實表現學生自己設計成品的表面材質感.形狀.體積.色彩等等,再深入到表現.特色.機能.價值感等發揮實用攝影行銷及展示的功效.
description.en: Through the detailed explanations of multiple focusing adjustments and image correcting methods of the view camera (large format camera) to help students master the operation of the camera and many other photo taking techniques. The students shall be able to take picture of their own designing product (showing the right material quality, surface texture, the form, volume, weight and color).Furthermore, the students are requested to learn, to make full use of their knowledge as to show the character, function, value and uniqueness of their product in the picture for the purpose marketing promotion and exhibition.

description.zh: 運用電腦軟體製作並模擬實物設計，利用電腦技巧學習模擬並展現產品之外型、結構、色彩、質感等。
description.en: This course helps students create and simulate the design of real objects with the assistance of computer in order to display the outlook, structure, color and texture of products.

notes: 日職合開須有設計基礎自備筆電及Alias軟體

name.zh: 綠能產業政策與經濟分析
name.en: Industrial Policy of Green Energy and Economic Analysis

description.zh: 在推動國家經濟發展，提升環境保護和創造國家競爭力，政府對於科技政策之擬定，及科技經費之持續支持十分重要，並以此培植科技人才、將科技研發成果加以推廣。為確保有限之科技資源能夠發揮其最高之效用，建立客觀及公正之績效評估制度實屬必要。本課程擬以最近影響人類生活環境甚巨之全球暖化現象( Global Warming )，及其引發之綠能科技投資為例，探討綠能科技政策之擬訂，以及綠能產業經濟分析。綠色能源包括風能、太陽能、生質能、氫能與燃料電池、地熱能、海洋能與淨煤技術，發展綠能產業即具備「3E」平衡發展之功效，已成各國追求之目標。本課程預計將涵蓋以下主題：�X替代能源介紹（包括生質能源，如生質柴油與酒精汽油，以及氫能與燃料電池等）�X再生能源介紹（包括太陽能、風能、水力發電、地熱及海洋能等）�X二氧化碳捕捉與封存、淨煤專題�XLED專題等
description.en: Many scientists conclude that the increased greenhouse effect is already accelerating global warming and leading to the climate change. Worldwide government are taking measures to tackle this issue and outlining strategies to bring the greenhouse effect under control.Greenhouse gas emissions in Taiwan are mainly from burning fossil fuels such as crude oil, coal and LPG and the energy imports have reached 99.22%. Therefore, the sustainable development in any country is to increase the proportion of self-generation of energy, reduce the emission of GHGs, and balance among Economic Growth, Environment Protection and Energy Supply.Green energy (Renewable energy) covers the fields of solar and wind energy, biofuels which includes biodiesel and bioethanol, hydrogen energy and fuel cell, geothermal and ocean energy as well as clean coal combustion technologies (IGCC). Balancing development of '3E' can be achieved by developing green energy industries and which is also the goal every count

description.zh: 速寫是最古老、最容易、最快速的溝通方式之一，也是充滿希望的設計師及藝術家必備的絕技。藉由大量的植物寫生，提昇觀察能力並把線條練活，進而建立起掌控「形」的基本信心。接下來的靜物寫生著重整體的構圖關係，利用黑白灰的構圖原理，著眼在傳其「神」而不是傳其「形」。將前階段的單線練習，改作分塊、分面的線群練習。再接下來是人物肖像寫生練習。到此，線條的特質、比例的嚴謹皆要掌控，肖像對象的性別、年齡、特徵以及由內在而外顯的神韻，是畫者所要表達的。
description.en: Sketching is one of the oldest, easiest and quickest methods of communication and also one of the most important skills a hopeful designer and artist must master. The course begins with a lot of plants sketching that helps to enhance your observation and build up your confidence in mastering forms and shapes in order to make your sketches vivid. Next still life sketching focuses on the composition. You are encouraged to utilize the composition principle of black, white and gray, and emphasize more on the vividness than the form until you get rid of the habit of passive copying of the objects. Then you move from the previous linear sketching practice into facet sketching and then block sketching. At the end of the semester, you will practice human portrait sketching. Until now you should be able to handle not only the characteristics of the line and proportion, but also the gender, age, charm and expression of the model.

name.en: Introduction to Integration of Production Planning and Control

description.zh: 隨著自動化科技與資訊技術的日益精進，產業生產活動也結合這些相關技術，朝向自動化及電子化目標以改善企業體質，提升企業競爭力。發展自動化及電子化之同時，也該就相關知識及資訊進行整合，如此方能生產規劃與現場控制之相關活動作最好之協調。本課程之主要目標便是教導學生關於規劃與控制之相關知識，以及進行整合時所需之觀念及技術。
description.en: The manufacturing system becomes more complex due to the more competitive situation occurring in the marketplace. In order to survive，the enterprise must combine the automation technology and information technology to improve the manufacturing activities for fulfilling the need of production. Therefore，the aim of this course is to teach the concept and technology for integrating production planning and shop floor control.

description.zh: 本課程以越南語教學為主，培養學生的聽、說、讀、寫能力，以達到溝通的目的，增進學生對越南文化的認識與興趣，提供學生越南語的基礎知識，越南經貿、觀光文化及越語字母拼音教學，讓學生在學習越語的同時，深入了解越南文化，協助學生拓展東南亞的就業版圖。
description.en: This course will help students have basic communicate skill, basic knowledge of Vietnamese (including alphabet, phonetic and grammar) and better understand Vietnam culture.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。包括液滲檢測法、磁粉檢測法、放射線、超音波檢測法、中子射線、全像攝影檢測法等、針對各種檢測方法之原理、可靠度、靈敏度等作探討。
description.en: Liquid-Penetrant Examination, Magnetic Particle Examination, Radiographic Examination, Ultrasonic Examination, and other less common techinques. Physical  Bases  of  Tests, Materials  to which applicable, Calibration Standards, and  Reliability.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。材料性質、製程與結構之關係、機械基礎-彈性行為、塑性基本理論。冶金基礎-單晶的塑性變形、差排理論、強化機構、材料的破壞。
description.en: Mechanical Fundamentals: Introduction, stress and strain relationships for Elastic Behavior, Elements of the theory of Plasticity, etc.. Metallurgical Fundamentals: Plastic Deformation of Single Crystal, Dislocation Theory, Strengthening Mechanism, Fracture, etc..

description.zh: 由於網際網路的快速發展，帶來了一個新的商務模式的發展。本課程希望能給同學們對企業創新課題的廣泛性了解，也深入的介紹一些基本的觀念和原理原則。另外，企業創新，許多都和新科技的新應用有關，而當中許多的可能性都還在發展階段，本門課主要是在探討創新的一些基本觀念，以及國內外企業創新的案例。
description.en: Since the Internet EB fast development, the new business model should be developed. This course will offer some topics related to business innovation and management issues. The fundamental concept and theoretic principle will also introduce.   Besides, the concept and applications of business and service model, business process reengineering, and the case study will also include.

description.zh: 自動化機械相關機電界面等技術問題，內容包括自動化機構、致動器、感測器、控制器等之原理介紹，並配合機電整合設備，使同學由實習中獲得機電整合之概念。
description.en: Interface Techniques Concerning Automatic Machinery; Subjects Include Theory and Application Know-How of Mechanisms, Actuators, Sensors, And Controllers; Experiments also provided.

description.zh: 本課程的目標在使學生了解工業安全衛生的重要,熟悉有關知識及緊急措施,從而增加處變之因應能力.內容包括工業安全衛生組織,事故調查分析,工廠設備安全要領,工業衛生和衛生設備.
description.en: This course is design to introduce the student to concept of the importance of industrial safety and health with emphasis on the ability of dealing with accidents. Topics covered are organization of industrial safety , analysis of Accident ,industrial health and facilities.
